username.description: Username (required because the artifact runs in a system context)

ms_account_user.description: The Microsoft account email from cdx.transform.microsoft.com - DO NOT use your UiPath account or IT gets a heart attack

ms_account_pw.description: The Microsoft account password from cdx.transform.microsoft.com

autoarm_processes.description: Demo processes for which you want to automatically run the arming procedure. Use a comma-separated list

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('python ./config.py --password "', parameters('password'), '"', ' --username "', parameters('username'), '"', ' --ms_account_user "', parameters('ms_account_user'), '"', ' --ms_account_pw "', parameters('ms_account_pw'), '"', ' --autoarm "', parameters('autoarm_processes'), '"', ' --key_vault "', parameters('key_vault'), '"' ) ]
